Some Say ...

30 Mar 2018 Some Say “..

Some Say “..

She is beauty Some say she is wine Some just pretended Some cried that she is mine

She is beauty
Some say she is wine
Some just pretended 
Some cried that she is mine

An Inverted World

27 Mar 2018 An Inverted World

An Inverted World

Flowers bloom No sign of gloom But I hold an inverted world.

Flowers bloom
No sign of gloom
But I hold an inverted world.

The Strings

01 Feb 2018 The Strings

The Strings

Melodious as it may Sweet as it could get. Day by day. Night by night. Every moment of a new chord. Every new prayer to the old lord.

Melodious as it may
Sweet as it could get.
Day by day.
Night by night.
Every moment of a new chord.
Every new prayer to the old lord.

Walk of life

08 Dec 2017 Walk of life

Walk of life

Treading and trailing All the newness Inhaling

Treading and trailing 
All the newness
Inhaling

Do you feel?

20 Oct 2017 Do you feel ?

Do you feel ?

When your mother’s eyes Are wet Of the pain She dealt Do you feel ?

When your mother’s eyes 
Are wet 
Of the pain 
She dealt 
Do you feel ?
